content.query:
SELECT
    --upper(SubscriptionName) as SubscriptionName
    --,upper(ResourceGroup) as ResourceGroup
    --,CostInBillingCurrency as Cost
    --,Tags
    sum(CostInBillingCurrency)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/20240201-20240229/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_20240201-20240229.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where 
    upper(Tags) not like N'%"COSTALLOCATIONTYPE": "WBS"%' AND    
    upper(SubscriptionName) like 'S913-AURORA-NON-PRODUCTION'
    and lower(ResourceGroup) = 'mc_dev-aurora-ngrm-00_dev-aurora-ngrm-00_northeurope'
